TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CursorInteropHelper extends System.Object
public ref class CursorInteropHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: Fornece uma classe auxiliar estática para interoperação do WPF/Win32 com um método, que é usado para obter um objeto do WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation) com base em um identificador de cursor do Win32 fornecido.

span.span: Provides a static helper class for WPF/Win32 interoperation with one method, which is used to obtain a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) object based on a provided Win32 cursor handle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Input.Cursor Create(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle cursorHandle) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (cursorHandle As SafeHandle) As Cursor

param.name: cursorHandle
param.span: Referência de cursor a ser usada para a interoperação.

span.span: Cursor reference to use for interoperation.

summary.span: Retorna um objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] baseado em um identificador de cursor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] fornecido.

span.span: Returns a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] object based on a provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.

returns.span: O objeto de cursor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] baseado no identificador de cursor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] fornecido.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] cursor object based on the provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Definindo uma imagem do cursor personalizado requer permissões de segurança, mesmo se feito puro [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] de programação.Setting a custom cursor image requires security permissions even if done in pure [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programming. Consulte .See .
